title: I feel sorry for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day.
author: Dean Martin

title: I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.

title: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.

author: William Blake

author: Arthur Schopenhauer

author: Larry Page

author: Colin Powell

title: It is a matter of shame that in the morning the birds should be awake earlier than you.
author: Abu Bakr

title: Good morning is a contradiction of terms.

author: Ovid

author: George Washington Carver

author: Henry David Thoreau

title: Be pleasant until ten o'clock in the morning and the rest of the day will take care of itself.
author: Elbert Hubbard

author: Jim Carrey

author: Salvador Dali

author: Usain Bolt

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

author: William Arthur Ward

author: Benjamin Franklin

author: Bruce Willis

title: Early morning cheerfulness can be extremely obnoxious.
author: William Feather

author: Ray Bradbury

title: The sun is new each day.
author: Heraclitus

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

title: It's always such a joy that you wake up in the morning and there's work to do.
author: Jerome Lawrence

title: I never knew a man come to greatness or eminence who lay abed late in the morning.

title: It is not time for mirth and laughter, the cold, gray dawn of the morning after.

author: Victor Hugo

author: Kurt Vonnegut

author: Elon Musk

author: Winston Churchill

title: My philosophy is if you're a man at night, you gotta be a man in the morning.

author: Romain Grosjean

author: Philip Rosenthal

author: F. Sionil Jose

author: Dick Cheney

author: Tom Cotton

author: Bob Dylan

author: Samuel Butler

author: Henry Ford

author: Tim Tebow

author: Samuel Daniel

author: Robert Frost

author: Kimberly Schlapman

author: Steve Jobs

title: I wake up every morning new, free as a bird.
author: Ashley Cole

title: I'm so stupid because I refuse to think that I'm getting older. I get up in the morning, and it's like, 'La, la, la, I'm so pretty.' I still mingle with a lot with young people. title: No matter how bad things are, you can at least be happy that you woke up this morning.

author: Konrad Lorenz

title: I don't ask for the meaning of the song of a bird or the rising of the sun on a misty morning. There they are, and they are beautiful.
author: Pete Hamill

title: Inspiration can come from anywhere, and a lot of the time, it depends on how you feel when you get up in the morning.
author: Tyler Shaw

title: Food is a huge passion of mine, and because I want to eat whatever I want, I run every morning, and then I do weights a few times a week. It's just how I can balance eating pancakes in the morning, a big burger for lunch, and then a fat steak and cheesecake at night.
author: Matt Barr

title: I wake up every morning, look in the mirror and ask, 'Am I a sex symbol?' Then I go back to bed again. It's stupid to think that way.
author: Antonio Banderas

title: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

title: Every morning when I wake up, I am grateful and happy that I come to the film set. It is home.
author: Arjun Kapoor

author: Dwayne Johnson

title: I woke up one morning thinking about wolves and realized that wolf packs function as families. Everyone has a role, and if you act within the parameters of your role, the whole pack succeeds, and when that falls apart, so does the pack.

title: I always beat the sun up in the morning. It's the secret to why I'm double trouble.
author: Al Sharpton

title: There is a force of exultation, a celebration of luck, when a writer finds himself a witness to the early morning of a culture that is defining itself, branch by branch, leaf by leaf, in that self-defining dawn, which is why, especially at the edge of the sea, it is good to make a ritual of the sunrise.

title: Swallow a toad in the morning and you will encounter nothing more disgusting the rest of the day.
author: Nicolas Chamfort

author: John Burroughs

title: Every day, I wake up and say, 'Good Morning, Jesus.'
author: Vanity

title: You just gotta use the sunset as a reset button and start over in the morning with every chance you get to open your eyes.

title: There is no friend like an old friend who has shared our morning days, no greeting like his welcome, no homage like his praise.

author: Ani DiFranco

title: My perfect morning is spent drinking coffee, eating porridge and reading the paper at a local cafe.
author: Anton du Beke

title: I love the water. Everything about it. Smelling the humidity in the air, seeing the mist rise in the morning, feeling the dew-wet grass on my bare feet. I love watching the fish jump and the geese land. We even have an eagle here that circles every so often.
author: Lori Foster

title: I don't know why you call it morning sickness, because I was sick all day and night!
author: Soleil Moon Frye

title: That nice, soft pillow and the warm blanket, and it's all comfortable, and no one wants to leave that comfort - but if you can wake up early in the morning, get a head start on everyone else that's still sleeping, get productive time doing things that you need to do - that's a huge piece to moving your life forward.
author: Jocko Willink

title: Never get married in the morning - you never know who you might meet that night.
author: Paul Hornung

title: You know, I looked at my face in the mirror this morning, and I like being old. My face has more content and when I train in the gym now, I am not training to be strong or handsome - just better than I was yesterday. These days the race is just against myself.
author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

title: When I wake up in the morning, I just can't get started until I've had that first, piping hot pot of coffee. Oh, I've tried other enemas.
author: Emo Philips

title: Autumn arrives in early morning, but spring at the close of a winter day.

title: I wake up every morning and I surprise myself. I wake up to a new me.

title: I couldn't be luckier to wake up every morning and be so excited to get to work, even if it's five in the morning.

title: The key to forming good habits is to make them part of your 'rituals.' I have a morning ritual, afternoon ritual, and Sunday ritual. It's one way to bundle good habits into regular times that you set aside to prepare yourself for the life you want. Rituals help you form habits.

title: Sometimes, getting up in the morning and brushing your teeth is the hardest part of the day - it all just hurts.

title: Some people never learn, no matter how much their heads hurt in the morning.

title: What's the first thing I do when I wake up in the morning? Wish I hadn't.
author: Morrissey

title: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.

title: A bachelor is a man who comes to work each morning from a different direction.

title: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning.

title: I've been keeping a diary for thirty-three years and write in it every morning. author: David Sedaris

title: Editing is a lot about patience and discipline and just banging away at something, turning off the machine and going home at night because you're frustrated and depressed, and then coming back in the morning to try again.

title: The temptation to take the easy road is always there. It is as easy as staying in bed in the morning and sleeping in. But discipline is paramount to ultimate success and victory for any leader and any team.

title: I try to woo the person whom I love. Even a good morning call to start the day is good enough for me.
author: Kartik Aaryan

title: I slept with faith and found a corpse in my arms on awakening; I drank and danced all night with doubt and found her a virgin in the morning.
author: Aleister Crowley

author: Alexis Ren

author: Hannah Kent

author: John Scalzi

author: Chanakya

title: Even if you don't have time for a big workout, stretching in the morning and night really changes your body.

author: Stella McCartney

author: Reid Scott

author: Cat Cora

title: Greet every morning with open arms and say thanks every night with a full heart. Each day is a precious gift to be savored and used, not left unopened and hoarded for a future that may never come.

title: The first fresh hour of every morning should be dedicated to the Lord, whose mercy gladdens it with golden light.
author: Charles Spurgeon

title: I get up every morning and thank God for giving me the opportunity to play football.
author: Memphis Depay

author: Anna Quindlen

author: Ray Bradbury

author: Rick Pitino

author: Viola Davis

title: It seems to me madness to wake up in the morning and do something other than paint, considering that one may not wake up the following morning.
author: Frank Auerbach

author: Tony Gonzalez

title: Basically I wake up in the morning and I think everything's going to be great. I'm really kind of optimistic, and I look forward to a new day. I pick up 'The New York Times,' and I look at the front page and realize that once again I'm wrong. I start to fixate on stuff.
author: Lewis Black

author: Haruki Murakami

author: Gaston Bachelard

author: Harold Pinter

title: I was passionate about soccer. I still am. Odd, though - playing soccer always made me much more anxious than playing tennis. On soccer days, I'd be out of bed by 6 in the morning, all nervous. But I was always calm when it was time for a tennis match. I still don't know why.
author: Rafael Nadal

author: Byron Katie

title: Sometimes I wake up in the morning and I am like, 'This is a high-top day' or 'This is a bob day,' but when I get my clothes on that's when I see.
author: Nicki Minaj

title: The plane took off at 8:10 in the morning - or that's when it was scheduled to take off. And that's when I believe it took off. I had been in my office at the Department of Justice. Someone told me that there had been the two strikes that occurred at the World Trade Center.
author: Ted Olson

title: There is only one thing that a man really wants to do, all his life; and that is, to find his way to his God, his Morning Star, salute his fellow man, and enjoy the woman who has come the long way with him.
author: D. H. Lawrence

title: I couldn't live without tea. I have two cups in the morning, one at lunch, two in the afternoon and one in the evening - Assam with milk and sugar. It has to be leaf tea - no bags - and drunk from a china cup.

title: I get up in the morning and I go to practice like everyone else.
author: Kylian Mbappe

title: Where I grew up in Vermont, there is no municipal garbage removal. You have to bring your trash to the dump every weekend. I would go to the garbage dump, get petitions signed, give out literature, talk to voters.
author: Robby Mook

title: I have this fantasy of my older days, painting or sculpting or making things. I have this fantasy of a bike trip to Chile. I have this fantasy of flying into Morocco. But right now, it's about getting the work done and getting home to family. I have an adventure every morning, getting up.
author: Brad Pitt

title: I show up in my writing room at approximately 10 A.M. every morning without fail. Sometimes my muse sees fit to join me there and sometimes she doesn't, but she always knows where I'll be. She doesn't need to go hunting in the taverns or on the beach or drag the boulevard looking for me.
author: Tom Robbins

title: The bed is a bundle of paradoxes: we go to it with reluctance, yet we quit it with regret; we make up our minds every night to leave it early, but we make up our bodies every morning to keep it late.
author: Ogden Nash

title: With Saturday morning cartoons, you've got to start at 6 A.M., right?
author: Jim Rash

title: We are using the same water that the dinosaurs drank, and this same water has to make ice creams in Pasadena and the morning frost in Paris.
author: Rose George

title: I am addicted to cereal. I am one of those people who just loves their cereal morning, noon and night. Kellogg's message is what I tell my kids every single day, which is: You've gotta start off your day right with a good, healthy breakfast to give yourself the potential for greatness.
author: Summer Sanders

title: In the morning, I always eat fruit and yogurt with cereal. And for lunch and dinner, I always have vegetables as a side.
author: Vittoria Ceretti

title: After the first day of practice, there's not one guy who's playing at 100 percent or who feels great. Sometimes, getting up in the morning and brushing your teeth is the hardest part of the day - it just hurts.
author: Tom Brady

title: My brain is so anxiety-prone, like a pinball machine. If I don't get up in the morning and focus my thinking, my breathing, and my being for about 12 minutes, I'm just a screwball all day long.

title: Well, I get my subject on Wednesday night; I think it out carefully on Thursday, and make my rough sketch; on Friday morning I begin, and stick to it all day, with my nose well down on the block.
author: John Tenniel

title: There can be nothing without love. No money, no power. Love is very important. When you wake up in the morning, you need to know that somebody else is waking up, thinking of you.
author: Giorgio Armani

title: You can't be as old as I am without waking up with a surprised look on your face every morning: 'Holy Christ, whaddya know - I'm still around!' It's absolutely amazing that I survived all the booze and smoking and the cars and the career.
author: Paul Newman

title: I do heavy weights in the morning for about an hour, and then I do 45 minutes of higher-volume lifting in the afternoon. My least favorite is the legs... I do quite a few chin-ups and rows. I do mostly old-school lifting with a lot of squats.
author: Hugh Jackman

title: The future is in our power. Let us, then, each morning, resolve to send the day into eternity in such a garb as we shall wish it to wear forever. And at night, let us reflect that one more day is irrevocably gone, indelibly marked.
author: Adoniram Judson

title: That's my father's theme. Get up in the morning, 'hello, Dad.' 'Get a job, leave the food alone... Who took my car?' America, you young kids, get a job. All that sagging, the clothes hanging behind, that ain't nothing. Get a job. You want to be somebody, get a job.
author: John Witherspoon

title: I absolutely love Piers Morgan and there's absolutely no point in watching 'Good Morning Britain' if he's not on it.
author: Spencer Matthews

title: I start off my morning with an Acai berry smoothie. I blend the Acai berries with kefir, blueberries, protein powder and peanut butter. I like this first thing in the morning because it's light on my stomach.
author: Charity Shea

title: Complex tasks are often better handled in the back of our mind, and that's often true of creative tasks - when you have something complex to deal with in writing or research or responding to an email. author: Adam Grant

title: My favorite meal would have to be good old-fashioned eggs, over easy, with bacon. Many others, but you can't beat that on a Sunday morning, especially with a cup of tea.
author: Gary Oldman

title: I didn't want to be an actress; I never thought of being an actress because, as children, there were three of us - I was the middle child - and we spent our time in church from Sunday morning to Saturday night.
author: Cicely Tyson

title: I never think of yesterday. Can't do anything about it. I'm a positive guy. When you really deep down look at it, we go to bed every night, get up every morning, stay here for 70 or 80 years, and then we die.
author: Lee Trevino

title: I do the 'New York Times' crossword puzzle every morning to keep the old grey matter ticking.
author: Carol Burnett

title: I wake up in the morning and my mind starts making sentences, and I have to get rid of them fast - talk them or write them down.
author: Ernest Hemingway

title: I get up at 7:30 and work four hours a day. Nine to twelve in the morning, five to six in the evening. Businessmen would achieve better results if they studied human metabolism. No one works well eight hours a day. No one ought to work more than four hours.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

title: There's a new holiday tradition in my life, and it comes with an open door policy. Starting at 11 a.m. on Christmas Day, friends, family, whoever, is welcome to swing on through my place - I'll be cooking and drinking from morning till night.
author: Brad Leone

title: I woke up one morning to find I was famous. I bought a white Rolls-Royce and drove down Sunset Boulevard, wearing dark specs and a white suit, waving like the Queen Mum.
author: Peter O'Toole

title: Since I travel so much, it's always great to be home. There's nothing like getting to raid my own refrigerator at two in the morning.

title: If you got up this morning and had fruits for breakfast, it was probably picked by the bent back of an immigrant worker. If you slept in a hotel or motel of the nation, you probably had your room done by an immigrant worker.

title: We also own a little boat and I'm like a kid with it. I take off early in the morning, fishing rod in tow, and just drift about the ocean all day.

title: I love the sunrise, as I am definitely a morning person! It's a great time to get up and have a coffee in the garden by myself before everybody wakes up.

title: The average, healthy, well-adjusted adult gets up at seven-thirty in the morning feeling just plain terrible.
author: Jean Kerr

title: Mark Zuckerberg needs no introduction these days, what with all the magazine covers and morning news shows. My mother knows who he is now, and my mother can hardly turn on a computer.

title: I prefer a long day of starting in the morning over working late into the night.
author: Jon Hopkins

title: Drag is about whatever persona you put on to do a particular task. I could pick up trash in the morning and throw on my navy blue jumpsuit, and that would be that gig!
author: Aquaria

title: When you get up in the morning and know you're doing something you love, feel fit and look after yourself, it's just a great thing to do.
author: Jermain Defoe

title: Most people dream a dream when they are asleep. But to be a writer, you have to dream while you are awake, intentionally. So I get up early in the morning, 4 o'clock, and I sit at my desk and what I do is just dream. After three or four hours, that's enough. In the afternoon, I run. The next day, the dream will continue.
author: Haruki Murakami

title: The morning after my high-school graduation found me up early job hunting. The dream of college I put on the back burner.
author: Martha Reeves

title: First thing I do in the morning, after I have my breakfast and do my spiritual work, is put on my makeup and fix my hair, and I can do my makeup in 15 minutes.

title: I usually eat cereal every morning.

title: I'm going to the gym six days a week. I'm eating right. Well-balanced diet. I drink a juice smoothie every morning.

title: A college experience is something everyone should have. Going to Waffle House late at night. Or the gym at midnight, until the wee hours of the morning. Just being kids. Hanging out.

title: You don't learn style from watching people on a runway. Fashion happens every morning when you wake up.
author: Shalom Harlow

title: I'm very happy with the way I look. I wake up some morning, catch myself in the bathroom mirror, and go, 'hey girl, you're alright'. You can't take anything like that too seriously, otherwise you'd end up in the loony bin.
author: Cameron Diaz

title: My dad is too cute. Every morning, he sends me one motivational quote. I have a folder full of all his quotes.
author: Alia Bhatt

title: I was so young, and making movies, going to the studio every morning at dawn was magic.
author: Natalie Wood

title: I'd wake up in the morning and I would think, 'Where am I?' I'd have to gather myself.

author: Jean Paul

title: Do you know how many calories are in butter and cheese and ice cream? Would you get your dog up in the morning for a cup of coffee and a donut?

title: It was a splendid summer morning and it seemed as if nothing could go wrong.
author: John Cheever

author: Jim O'Heir

title: I always like to start my morning with a good amount of fruit. I really like pineapple, particularly because of the enzymes that it has. Sometimes I have oatmeal. title: You were up at 5 o'clock in the morning, and then you'd ride in a caravan, because we didn't have big movie trucks or trailers that is the hardware of a movie camp.
author: Marguerite Moreau

title: Distribution has really changed. You can make a record with a laptop in the morning and have it up on YouTube in the afternoon and be a star overnight. title: I tend not to look at Twitter in the morning; I try to force myself not to, for time management. I'll look at it on the way to work.
author: Lawrence O'Donnell

author: Stuart Scott

title: It's not fun to get out of bed early in the morning. When the alarm goes off, it doesn't sing you a song: it hits you in the head with a baseball bat. So how do you respond to that? Do you crawl underneath your covers and hide? Or do you get up, get aggressive, and attack the day?
author: Jocko Willink

title: The great secret of doctors, known only to their wives, but still hidden from the public, is that most things get better by themselves; most things, in fact, are better in the morning.
author: Lewis Thomas

author: Brian Shaw

title: As for my daily, it usually consists of a smoothie in the morning with banana, spinach and blueberry and veggie protein powder, then some kind of tofu or tempeh scramble with veggies. author: Austin Aries

author: Amanda Nunes

title: My morning starts with some form of exercise, and I give two hours - from 5:30 to 7:30 A.M. - to my personal fitness.
author: Sushant Singh Rajput

author: Moby

title: Typically, I spend a lot of time - mostly in the morning - kind of drifting, reading, walking down along the river, looking at photographs, or even driving around. Then, if I'm lucky, I get to work in the early afternoon, one way or another.
author: David Means

title: The first thing I think about when I wake up most mornings is the fact that I'm tired. I have been tired for decades. I am tired in the morning and I am tired while becalmed in the slough of the afternoon, and I am tired in the evening, except right when I try to go to sleep.
author: Susan Orlean

title: Sometimes I'll get ideas in the middle of the night. Sometimes at 3 in the morning I'll get up, and I have a notebook by my bed and have to write it down. I'll dream an idea. Sometimes I see an image online, and I think, 'OK, let's make that a three-layer cake!'
author: Rosanna Pansino

title: I'd hate to be a teetotaler. Imagine getting up in the morning and knowing that's as good as you're going to feel all day.
author: Dean Martin

title: Sunday morning, I wake up at, like, 6 or 6:30 to go to the gym. I drink a glass of water, and then, before I start my workout, I drink a cup of coffee.
author: Salt Bae

title: Oprah's got good politics, she's got a good heart, and she'll have us all up Jazzercising at six in the morning. This cannot be a bad thing, and reading a book while we're Jazzercising. So America would be better off if Oprah were president.
author: Michael Moore

title: I would be up until 3 or 4 o'clock in the morning on nights I was facing a wall. Because when I walked into WWE, I was told I was going to be fired ten times because I'm the smallest guy around.
author: Enzo Amore

author: Emily Maitlis

title: Oh, I have this feud going with the L.A. Unified School District, because I keep getting these phone calls saying my daughter keeps missing classes, I mean, at all hours of the night, I had like, two calls this morning and I keep calling saying I haven't got a daughter!
author: Chris Colfer

title: Quite often, while I'm getting up in the morning, I think my warranty is running out on these body parts because it's not working quite the way it used to.
author: John Glenn

title: It was wrenching to read about the brutality of Assad every morning, to see images of family homes reduced to rubble. I felt we had to do something in Syria.
author: Ben Rhodes

title: Christmas morning, I'm going to open presents with my kids. I'm going to take pictures of them opening the presents. Then I'm going to come to the Staples Center and get ready to work.
author: Kobe Bryant

title: When you think of a teenager, you think of hanging out with friends a lot or going to a full-time school. On the weekends, my friends are staying up until, like, one in the morning, and then there's me fighting to stay up until eight.
author: Kaetlyn Osmond

title: Discipline starts every day when the first alarm clock goes off in the morning. I say 'first alarm clock' because I have three, as I was taught by one of the most feared and respected instructors in SEAL training: one electric, one battery powered, one windup.
author: Jocko Willink

title: One morning, about four o'clock, I was driving my car just about as fast as I could. I thought, Why am I out this time of night? I was miserable, and it came to me: I'm falling in love with somebody I have no right to fall in love with.
author: June Carter Cash

title: Every morning, I crawl out of bed. I sit there and think, 'Do I really need this?' And I drag myself to the gym in my garage. It's not fun. I hate it. I work out alone. Weights.
author: Sylvester Stallone

title: I have a lot of tea in the morning. I always have toast and peanut butter.
author: Joanna Coles

title: I run a tight ship. The kids are responsible for their own chores. Each morning they unload the dishwasher from the night before then collect eggs from our chickens, and I cook those while they get ready for school.
author: Nadiya Hussain

title: Probably the happiest period in life most frequently is in middle age, when the eager passions of youth are cooled, and the infirmities of age not yet begun; as we see that the shadows, which are at morning and evening so large, almost entirely disappear at midday.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

title: Social media has given us the world at our fingertips every morning. And we watch it change, live. In the morning, in the old days, we'd read the 'Post,' and that was what we had.
author: Elvis Duran

title: I like to hit the gym early in the morning. I feel better throughout the day when I get in a workout first thing in the morning.
author: Derek Jeter

title: Sometimes I wish that there were a way to let people know that just because I live in a world without rules, and in a life that is lawless, doesn't mean that it doesn't hurt so bad the morning after.
author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

title: My dad, he worked rebar, an ironworker. Watching my pops get up every single morning, going into work, working hard - I think that really made me want to work that hard, wanted to make me get up early and go for a run or get a lift in or get some extra hitting in and really try to better myself every day.
author: Bryce Harper

title: When morning comes, you would better find yourself saying: 'I have so many choices of what to do or what to leave - every morning, every day. I better judge for myself, and - go ahead and do it.'
author: Stefan Hell

title: I learned to love myself, because I sleep with myself every night and I wake up with myself every morning, and if I don't like myself, there's no reason to even live the life.
author: Gabourey Sidibe

title: I wake up in the morning and I say 'Ahh! Today's the day for a song! I'm going to write a song today!' And I do. I write a song.
author: Brian Wilson

title: Too much coffee. Too much coffee and Gatorade. It's a hell of a mix. If you're ever tired in the morning, just try that mix, and tell me what you think.
author: Kevin Garnett

title: I have my Lucky Charms in the morning, and I feel magical.
author: Tracy Morgan

title: I draw flowers every day and send them to my friends so they get fresh blooms every morning.
author: David Hockney

title: If you cook something on the show, and I don't like it, I'm going to tell you. I don't understand how you could watch any of these morning shows, and everything everybody cooks is absolutely delicious. Are you kidding me, man?
author: Steve Harvey

title: Being gritty doesn't mean not showing pain or pretending everything is O.K. In fact, when you look at healthy and successful and giving people, they are extraordinarily meta-cognitive. author: Angela Duckworth

title: Your passion is that one thing you can't stop thinking about, that thing you wake up thinking about in the morning, go to sleep thinking about at night, that thing that you would do for free!
author: Charlamagne tha God

author: Malik Yoba

title: 'Good Morning America' exploited Joan Lunden's pregnancy, but you won't see me bringing my babies on the air. The only reason I'm talking about the babies at all is that they've been with me on the show since I became pregnant. After a while, I had to acknowledge this pumpkin tummy.
author: Jane Pauley

title: I have a chip on my shoulder I pet every morning, a constant feeling like I have something to prove. Hearing that the canon can't be diversified, there's no room for more brown faces - that fueled my fire.
author: Jason Reynolds

title: I'm a morning person so I like to be up by 6 am to wash and pray before the sun rises, and then have a tea at the kitchen table.
author: Nadiya Hussain

title: I recorded my hair this morning, tonight I'm watching the highlights.
author: Jay London

title: I remember lying on the floor of my room, staring at a black-and-white television for most of the '80s - watching 'Diff'rent Strokes,' 'Facts of Life,' 'Silver Spoons,' Saturday morning cartoons, and 'Murder, She Wrote' while eating an insane amount of Stouffer's French bread pizza. author: Jim Rash

title: I don't walk into the lab in the morning thinking, 'I am a woman, and I will carry out an experiment that will conquer the world.' I am a scientist, not male or female. A scientist.

title: You really have to be a morning person if you want to be a teacher.
author: Alanna Ubach

title: People tell me if I don't eat vegetables, I'm going to get scurvy. Well, what the hell. But I was never overweight as a player. author: Art Donovan

title: I started writing morning pages just to keep my hand in, you know, just because I was a writer and I didn't know what else to do but write. title: I know, some kids, their parents have nothing in common and don't ever talk. I can call my dad at 3 o'clock in the morning, and I know he is going to answer.
author: Charlotte Flair

title: Having children is fab. They keep me young and make me get up in the morning.
author: Jo Brand

author: George Strait

title: My husband is Dutch, and his family, when you sat down to eat food at the table, you never left the table until you ate living bread and drank living water. author: Ann Voskamp

title: When a man has been consistently battering his wife, he shouldn't expect a bouquet of roses from her the morning after he promises to stop.

author: Brie Larson

author: Bret Stephens
